messages.title: SAY YES TO THE COMMON GOOD
messages.content: THIS TIME - MAKE A REAL CHANGE WITH YOUR VOTE

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Restore the funding to local councils to protect our local services and green spaces
Reverse the NHS privatisations and provide free social care for the elderly and disabled
Bring the railways and the energy companies back under public control for the public good
Invest in renewable energy technologies to create a quarter of a million new green jobs
Provide a million new homes, scrap the hated Bedroom Tax and introduce fair rent caps

mentions.tacticalSituation: On May 7th - Voting for the Green Party will make the difference!

issues.health: Reverse the NHS privatisations and provide free social care for the elderly and disabled

housing.content: Provide a million new homes, scrap the hated Bedroom Tax and introduce fair rent caps

images.caption: MARTIN DOBSON and his team campaigning
Pie chart showing Green Party polling at 31%
